name: Champs Elysees
description: Let's start the weekend right--with a cocktail recipe from Paul Clarke (The Cocktail Chronicles). Need more than one? Hit up the archives. Cheers! Cocktails can be rich and rugged like a Manhattan, or crisp and sharp like a martini, or...

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into chilled cocktail glass.
